# These are dependencies necessary to build docs.
# Since we don't need compatibility with other dependencies when only producing the docs,
# we can here afford the luxury of pinning them.
jupytext==1.16.4
latexcodec==3.0.0
markdown==3.7
markdown-it-py==3.0.0
mkdocs==1.6.1
mkdocs-autorefs==1.2.0
mkdocs-gen-files==0.5.0
mkdocs-get-deps==0.2.0
mkdocs-glightbox==0.4.0
mkdocs-jupyter==0.25.1
mkdocs-literate-nav==0.6.1
mkdocs-material==9.5.43
mkdocs-material-extensions==1.3.1
mkdocs-section-index==0.3.9
mkdocstrings==0.26.2
mkdocstrings-python==1.12.2
nbclient==0.10.0
nbconvert==7.16.4
nbformat==5.10.4
